level.heading: LOSS OR THEFT OF SPECIAL LICENSE TAGS OR PERMIT (ยง 18-2705)

level.text: Loss or theft of the permit or tags shall be reported to the Director and to the police precinct in which the loss or theft occurred. The person with a disability shall give similar notice if the permit is recovered.
After each report of a lost or stolen tag or permit as provided in ยง 2705.1, a person may apply for a duplicate tag or permit, up to two (2) times in a one (1) year period.
